name: Peter James Cigar Co. - Emergence - Toro Elegance
additionalNotes: Luciano Cigars and Peter James Co. have joined forces to create Peter James Cigar Co., a new joint venture that promises to revolutionize the world of cigars. Its first line, Emergence, is a sensory journey that combines decades of experience in the manufacture of high-quality tobaccos. With a unique blend of tobaccos aged for years and a layer of Ecuadorian viso corojo, Emergence offers a complex and sophisticated flavor profile. Its launch at the PCA Las Vegas Convention marks an important milestone for the industry, positioning this new brand as a benchmark in the luxury cigar segment.
